name: tm56
effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user flings its held item at the target as an attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user flings its held item at the target as an attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
